name: Plants vs. Zombies (itch) (Purple)
description: There’s zombies on your lawn. The evil Dr.Zomboss has been starting zombie attacks for a long time. You have recently moved into the neighborhood and must stop his army from eating your brains, with the help of your crazy new neighbor, Crazy Dave. Play 14 levels, with three game modes, two of which are endless until you lose. 14 plants, 8 zombies, day and night in one demo. The full game can be played here:https://www.ea.com/games/plants-vs-zombies/plants-vs-zombies and this demo has been preserved from the end of flash.
